markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 331 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Angradd](/Deities.aspx?ID=444), [Chohar](/Deities.aspx?ID=675), [Dahak](/Deities.aspx?ID=337), [Eiseth](/Deities.aspx?ID=590), [Furcas](/Deities.aspx?ID=526), [Inna](/Deities.aspx?ID=539), [Radiant Prism](/Deities.aspx?ID=380), [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=292), [The Freeing Flame](/Deities.aspx?ID=231), [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=683), [Zarongel](/Deities.aspx?ID=507)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

A roaring blast of fire detonates at a spot you designate, dealing 6d6 fire damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Fireball

[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
An explosion of fire in an area burns creatures.
</summary>
summary: An explosion of fire in an area burns creatures.
summary_markdown: An explosion of fire in an area burns creatures.
text: Fireball Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 331 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Angradd, Chohar, Dahak, Eiseth, Furcas, Inna, Radiant Prism, Sarenrae, The Freeing Flame, Walkena, Zarongel Range 500 feet Area 20-foot burst Defense basic Reflex --- A roaring blast of fire detonates at a spot you designate, dealing 6d6 fire damage. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
